p: AFR, African Region; AMR, Region of the Americas; CSW, commercial sex workers; EMR, Eastern Mediterranean Region; EUR, European Region; HCC, hepatocellular carcinoma; MSM, men who have sex with men; OR, odds ratios; PAF, population attributable fraction; PWID, people who inject drugs; SEAR, South-East Asian Region; WHO, World Health Organisation; WPR, Western Pacific Region.
